title: Restricts the use of an electronic device while crossing a crosswalk in a city with a population of one million or more
summary: Restricts the use of an electronic device while crossing a crosswalk in a city with a population of one million or more; provides for a person in violation to be issued a summons and pay a civil fine of one hundred dollars.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to restricting the use of an electronic device while crossing the crosswalk in a city with a population of one million or more
